message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your deal wasn't quite fair to me. I'm willing to be generous, but this time it's my turn to get a slightly better share.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer is more reasonable now. I'm still willing to compromise, 58-42 is the best I can do.
Alice, we're running out of time here.  This offer is a good compromise, and it accounts for the fact that the value is decreasing for both of us.
